prompt: Create a single isolated print artwork on a vibrant hot pink solid background, centered composition, print-ready clean design. Feature a bold circular emblem with a thick bold black border around the entire emblem and bold black outlines around all text and graphic elements. Central graphic: a stylized white water polo ball with strong black linework and minimal distressed detailing for character, positioned above dynamic, crisp vector royal-blue and white splash waves. Include decorative small stars and subtle circular stamp dots inside the emblem while keeping overall look clean and high-contrast. Typography and layout: TEXT Hungarian: "VÍZILABDA" (above) TEXT Hungarian: "FINOM SPORT" (center) TEXT Hungarian: "DURVA EMBEREKNEK" (below). Render the top word arched along the upper rim in large condensed all-caps sans-serif with heavy weight and a thick black outline; place the middle line in a compact horizontal badge/banner in uppercase condensed sans, smaller scale; render the bottom phrase as a wide heavy all-caps slab/condensed display type with tight tracking and matching black outline. All type in white fill with thick black stroke for maximum contrast. Maintain clean vector edges, print-ready separations for spot color printing, and ensure the bold black border unifies both text and graphic elements. Isolated artwork only; no garment, no mockup, no fabric, no shadows.
negative_prompt: no garment, no mockup, no fabric texture, no shadows, no people, no photography, no background details, no watermark, low-resolution, t-shirt mockup, hoodie mockup, garment, fabric texture, wrinkles, folds, shadows, photo, model, background scene, studio lighting

debug.notes: All three lines are clear and legible in the reference: top arched 'VÍZILABDA', middle smaller 'FINOM SPORT', bottom large 'DURVA EMBEREKNEK'.
